Log:
Release 1.8.1.0 + Hotfix 1.8.1.1
- Fixed bugs in work with AI wizard - Speeded up work with AI wizard - Interface fixes for future localizations - Added full localization of the interface to Russian (set language in the preferences menu) - Fixed localizations to other languages (localizations only for photo booth screens) - Many small fixes and improvements - Added speed value control for SP105 Led devices
Hotfix 1.8.1.1: -Fixed random window combobox -Added some localization files
